com.github.f4irline.taskscheduler.Goals

Interface GoalDao


  • public interface GoalDao
    Data access object implementation, which defines the different queries related to the goal entities.
    Since:
    2019.0323

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Queries the room database to check if a goal with the given name exists already.

      Deletes a goal from the database.

      Deletes all goals from the database.

      Returns the goal done time from a specified goal.

      Returns the total goal time of all goals summed together from the database.

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfGoalExists

        androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<java.lang.Boolean> checkIfGoalExists(java.lang.String goalName)
        Queries the room database to check if a goal with the given name exists already.
        Parameters:
        goalName - the name of the goal.
        Returns:
        true if exists, false if not.

      • getAllGoals

        androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<java.util.List<Goal>> getAllGoals()
        Gets all goals from the database.
        Returns:
        all goals.

      • getTotalGoalTime

        float getTotalGoalTime()
        Returns the total goal time of all goals summed together from the database.
        Returns:
        the total goal time of all goals summed together.

      • insert

        void insert(Goal goal)
        Inserts a new goal to the database.
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal to be inserted.

      • deleteAll

        void deleteAll()
        Deletes all goals from the database.

      • getGoalDone

        float getGoalDone(int gId)
        Returns the goal done time from a specified goal.
        Parameters:
        gId - the id of the goal which's goal done time is requested.
        Returns:
        the goal done time from the goal.

      • delete

        Deletes a goal from the database.
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal to be deleted.

               float goalDone)
        Adds time done to a goal.
        Parameters:
        gId - the id of the goal updated.
        goalDone - the time done to be added to the goal.

        the id of the goal updated.

      • updateGoalTotal

        int updateGoalTotal(int gId,
                    float goalDoneTotal)
        Updates the goal done time with a new value.
        Parameters:
        gId - the id of the goal updated.
        goalDoneTotal - the total done time of the goal.
        Returns:
        the id of the goal updated.

      • goalTimeTick

        int goalTimeTick(int gId)
        Adds a second to the goal done time for a specified goal.
        Parameters:
        gId - the id of the goal updated.
        Returns:
        the id of the goal updated.
